comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. Victor:

text.language: Matamoi je k~se e~ywn: w~ Biktwr pamenrit n~s/ri: e~re pik/moc ,/ qen rwk: e~re niped/c qen nekjij.
Teach me where do you flee, O Victor my beloved son, for the muzzle is on your mouth, and the chains are on your hands.

language.div: Ajari aku, ke mana kau pergi, hai Victor, anakku terkasih, sebab mulutmu terbungkam, dan tanganmu dirantai.

text.language: اعلمنى الى أين تذهب. يا بقطر ابنى الحبيب واللجام فى فمك والقيود فى يديك.
Pejaf je ]se e~t~,wra: n~</mi e~ratf n~Armenioc: n~tamou e~jen v~ran m~paCwt/r: n~tef,a nanobi n/i e~bol.
He said "I fled to the land, of Egypt to Armenius, that I may die in the name of my Savior, and that He may forgive me my sins."

language.div: Ia berkata, "Aku lari ke tanah Mesir kepada Armenius, agar aku dapat mati demi nama Juruselamatku, agar Ia mengampuni dosa-dosaku."

text.language: قال أنا ذاهب الى اقليم مصر الى أرمانيوس لأموت على اسم مخلصى ليغفر لى خطاياى.
Pia~bot menenca vai: w~ Biktwr pamenrit n~s~/ri: ]cebtwt e~i~ri n~tekselet: n~ta] n~hanm/s n~,~r/ma nak.
"After that month, O Victor my beloved son, I am prepared to marry you off, and give you many riches."

language.div: “Setelah bulan ini berlalu, ya Victor anakku terkasih, aku telah siap untuk menikahimu, dan memberimu banyak kekayaan.”

text.language: من بعد هذا الشهر يابقطر ابنى الحبيب أنا مستعدة لعمل عرسك ولأعطيك أموالا كثيرة.
Pac/ou a~nok taselet ,/: w~ Marya tamenri] m~mau: taselet te ]e~kkl/cia: papatselet pe pacwt/r.
"My time and my wedding will come, O Martha my beloved mother, for the Church is my wedding, and my Savior is my bridegroom."

language.div: "Waktuku dan pernikahanku akan tiba, hai Marta ibuku tersayang, sebab Gereja adalah pernikahanku, dan Juruselamatku adalah mempelai priaku."

text.language: ان زمانى وعرسى صائر يا مرثا أمى الحبيبة. عروسى هى الكنيسة وعريسى هو مخلصى.
<ere nak w~ pimarturoc: n~te peno#c# I/#c# P,#c#: ,ere piswij n~genneoc: pia~gioc apa Biktwr.
Hail to you O martyr, of our Lord Jesus Christ, hail to the courageous hero, the saint Abba Victor.

language.div: Salam bagimu, hai martir, dari Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus, salam bagi pahlawan yang gagah berani, St. Abba Victor.

text.language: السلام لك يا شهيد ربنا يسوع المسيح السلام للشجاع القوى القديس أبا بقطر.
